TopicTitle: Interactive graphic: every active satellite orbiting Earth

Articles.Content:
Thought you guys might like this. It's beautiful. Hit spacebar to see them move.

http://qz.com/296941/interactive-graphic-every-active-satellite-orbiting-earth/

All those Iridium Sattelites: Incredible.

How can a company afford that many?
They couldn't. The current Iridium company is the company that bought the assets of the original company in a bankruptcy auction.
